mapper.select: SELECT b.id, m.profile_img FROM board b JOIN member m ON b.id = m.id GROUP BY b.id ORDER BY COUNT(b.id) DESC, b.id ASC LIMIT 0,5

SELECT b.sno, b.boardtype, b.nal, b.subject, (b.thumbup-b.thumbdown) AS thumb, m.profile_img, m.nickname, COUNT(r.repl_sno) AS countRepl FROM board b LEFT JOIN member m ON b.id = m.id LEFT JOIN repl r ON b.sno = r.sno WHERE b.boardtype = 'qna' GROUP BY b.sno, b.boardtype, b.nal, b.subject, (b.thumbup-b.thumbdown), m.profile_img, m.nickname ORDER BY b.sno DESC LIMIT 0, 5
